analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x948a45e21f436f55c6a6e3e479f1d453d392688b.sol:
	Contract DURIANX has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x948a45e21f436f55c6a6e3e479f1d453d392688b.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x948a45e21f436f55c6a6e3e479f1d453d392688b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x948a45e21f436f55c6a6e3e479f1d453d392688b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x948a45e21f436f55c6a6e3e479f1d453d392688b.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
